item.classicpipes.iron_pipe.desc: Routes items in a single direction.
item.classicpipes.flint_pipe.desc: Deploys items like a Dispenser would.
item.classicpipes.routing_pipe.a.desc: Routes items to other networked pipes.
item.classicpipes.routing_pipe.b.desc: Place at the junctions of your network.
item.classicpipes.provider_pipe.desc: Allows a network to pull from the adjacent container.
item.classicpipes.request_pipe.desc: Lets you request items from a network.
item.classicpipes.stocking_pipe.desc: Keeps a container stocked with items from a network.
item.classicpipes.matching_pipe.desc: Routes items matching the contents of the adjacent container.
item.classicpipes.recipe_pipe.a.desc: Routes ingredients for auto-crafting requested items.
item.classicpipes.recipe_pipe.b.desc: Attach to a Crafter or other processing system.
item.classicpipes.pipe_slicer.desc: Requests items to any networked pipe.
item.classicpipes.storage_pipe.a.desc: Combines functions of a Matching Pipe and Provider Pipe.
item.classicpipes.storage_pipe.b.desc: Useful for setting up a quick and simple storage system.
item.classicpipes.tag_label.desc: Use with an offhand item to cycle through that item's tags.
item.classicpipes.mod_label.desc: Use with an offhand item to set filter to that item's mod.
item.classicpipes.iron_fluid_pipe.desc: Routes fluids in a single direction.
item.classicpipes.advanced_copper_pipe.d: Extracts full stacks and can be filtered.
item.classicpipes.advanced_copper_fluid_: Extracts fluid faster and can be filtered.
container.classicpipes.provider_pipe: Items to provide, blank for all:
container.classicpipes.advanced_copper_p: Items to extract, blank for all:
container.classicpipes.advanced_copper_f: Fluids to extract, blank for all:
widget.classicpipes.name: Name
tooltip.classicpipes.match_components: If this is checked, the components of an item (damage, enchantments, etc.) must match the item in the filter.
tooltip.classicpipes.match_components_al: If this is checked, the components of an item (damage, enchantments, etc.) must match the item in the container.
tooltip.classicpipes.default_route: If this is checked, items will be routed here when they have nowhere else to go.
tooltip.classicpipes.leave_one: If this is checked, one item of each type will remain in the attached container and be inaccessible to the network.
tooltip.classicpipes.active_stocking: If this is checked, this pipe will actively request items from the network. Otherwise, it will passively stock the container when the matching items happen to pass through the network.
tooltip.classicpipes.blocking_mode: If this is checked, this pipe will hold ingredients until the previous result arrives.
chat.classicpipes.could_not_extract: Request for %sx %s cancelled, as the Provider Pipe at [%s] could not extract from its adjacent container.
chat.classicpipes.crafter_jammed: All requests cancelled as the Crafter at [%s] didn't output the expected result. Make sure it is pointing into the Recipe Pipe and isn't jammed.
chat.classicpipes.missing_recipe_pipe_di: All requests cancelled as the Recipe Pipe at [%s] isn't attached to a Crafter or other processing system.
chat.classicpipes.destination_removed: Request for %sx %s cancelled because the destination pipe at [%s] was disconnected from the network.
chat.classicpipes.nothing_in_offhand: You have no item in your other hand.
chat.classicpipes.no_tags_in_hand: The item in your other hand does not have any tags.
advancements.classicpipes.request_item.d: Use a Request Pipe to withdraw an item from a network
advancements.classicpipes.autocraft_reci: Use a Recipe Pipe to craft a Recipe Pipe
advancements.classicpipes.autocraft_eigh: Request an item requiring at least 8 crafting steps
